item.content:encoded: So, I've applied to write for UniLad. Would you like to read my banterous application? http://t.co/6D3rXia8 You know UniLad. The website that was shut down after they posted a "joke" suggesting that men should rape women if they can't pull them, because rape conviction rates are so low that they'll probably get away with it. UniLad took some time off to think about their actions (or more accurately, in… Link - Trackbacks

item.title: Whole Health Source: By 2606, the US Diet will be 100 Percent Sugar
item.description: Whole Health Source: By 2606, the US Diet will be 100 Percent Sugar http://t.co/MYkg9NcT
item.content:encoded: Whole Health Source: By 2606, the US Diet will be 100 Percent Sugar http://t.co/MYkg9NcT The US diet has changed dramatically in the last 200 years. Many of these changes stem from a single factor: the industrialization and commercialization of the American food system. We've outsourced most of our food preparation, placing it into the hands of professionals whose interests aren't always well aligned with ours. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: wholehealthsource.blogspot.com

item.content:encoded: How to cut 70 percent of your IT budget in one year: I’m not the first to jump on the latest technology. Even af... http://t.co/eEpu33dg I’m not the first to jump on the latest technology. Even after working in high-tech for more than 20 years, I am still a late adopter. item.title: Paul Babeu, Arizona Sheriff, Steps Down As Arizona Co-Chair Of Mitt Romney's Presidential Campaign
item.description: Paul Babeu, Arizona Sheriff, Steps Down As Arizona Co-Chair Of Mitt Romney's ... - Huffington Post http://t.co/XFaVUmrU
item.content:encoded: Paul Babeu, Arizona Sheriff, Steps Down As Arizona Co-Chair Of Mitt Romney's ... - Huffington Post http://t.co/XFaVUmrU Pinal County, Ariz. Sheriff Paul Babeu, a Republican congressional candidate, stepped down on Saturday from his position as the Mitt Romney campaign's Arizona co-chair, in the wake of explosive allegations that Babeu threatened a Mexican man, who claims to be his ex-boyfriend, with deportation. "Sheriff Babeu has stepped down from his volunteer position with the campaign so he can focus on the allegations against him," Romney campaign spokeswoman Andrea Saul confirmed in an email to The Huffington Post. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com

item.content:encoded: How the Mac Will Die http://t.co/tcEMqwoh Another Apple announcement, another de-emphasis on the Mac brand. It seems that every time Apple opens its corporate pie-hole, the venerable Macintosh brand drops down a notch in importance, and its future demise more likely. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: cultofmac.com

item.title: BBC News - Sweden snow: Man 'survives two months trapped in car'
item.description: Man 'survives two months in car' http://t.co/u4zZUsTW
item.content:encoded: Man 'survives two months in car' http://t.co/u4zZUsTW A Swedish man found alive in his snow-trapped car tells police he has survived inside for two months with no food. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: bbc.co.uk
